reviews.review_msg: exams are all lists. so remember everything off each slide. He goes off on tangents but it's okay. Makes you read the book which is sooooooo boring. His TA Jessica was useless and never available so don't rely on the TA for help.but still he's better than jenifer wong

He engages with his students a lot. He does go off on tangents a little. but it usually is relevant to the course. I found his notes extremely helpful, even when he could't cover parts of the textbook in detail, he told us specifically what to focus on. Midterm/Final was fair, not difficult (contrary to other ratings) overall fun + fair prof.

Lectures are ok and sometimes interesting(relates to his personal life). Likes discussions. Doesn't cover every topic in detail in lecture but has a slide at the end of each lecture that lists things to focus on in textbook (80% lecture, 20% text). Midterm/final were long & difficult especially the MC but SA was okay if you studied. Hard marker.

This class sucked, and verrrrry boring. Don't bother going to class because he goes off topic so much. You're better off just reading the textbook. Exams are unreasonable and not enough time to finish them. Worst crim class ever. He's an ok dude, but tries way too hard to be "cool".

Bryce doesn't read ratemyprof. BUT nonetheless, he is a good guy. Hilarious, young, new prof who knows his stuff. He tries to make things as clear as possible and is very helpful (esp. when you ask him for help 1-on-1). Relaxed lectures shouldn't fool you - you must work hard for an A. Good guy, good class. Would recommend!
Amazing prof! Makes every concept interesting. Highly recommend him!
Had Bryce as my TA a while back. Extremely hard and even somewhat unreasonable marker. Went off topic a lot in tutorials. Was willing to help though and was nice.
